article_title: Plain Talk: Really, state Republicans, Ted Cruz?
article_text:
Madison, WI (53711)

Today

Cloudy skies during the morning hours followed by scattered showers and thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 79F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms during the evening followed by a few showers overnight. Low 64F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

article_metadata.author: Dave Zweifel | The Capital Times

og.description: How could the Wisconsin GOP give its blessing to an outright homophobe and religious bigot whose only claim to fame is fear-mongering?
og.title: Plain Talk: Really, state Republicans, Ted Cruz?
